title: Lovely, spacious 2 bed on Longwood Ave. Walk to T & hospitals.
posting_body: *Pictures of similar unit* Absolutely perfect location near Longwood medical.
Walk to the hospitals or the T. You won't find a better option in Brookline at this price!
Bedroom with an en suite bathroom.
Large layout with plenty of light.
Well maintained property with an excellent landlord.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
